data.name: s0
data.value: The Sovereignty

data.name: s1
data.value: Bismillah hir rahman nir raheem {In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful}

data.name: s10
data.value: Qaaloo balaa qad jaaa’anaa nazeerun fakazzabnaa wa qulnaa maa nazzalal laahu min shai in in antum illaa fee dalaalin kabeer {They will say,” Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'”}

data.name: s11
data.value: Wa qaaloo law kunnaa nasma’u awna’qilu maa kunnaa feee as haabis sa’eer {And they will say, “If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze.”}

data.name: s12
data.value: Fa’tarafoo bizambihim fasuhqal li as haabis sa’eer {And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze}

data.name: s13
data.value: Innal lazeena yakhshawna rabbahum bilghaibi lahum maghfiratunw wa ajrun kabeer {Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward}

data.name: s14
data.value: Wa asirroo qawlakum awijharoo bih; innahoo ‘aleemum bizaatis sudoor {And conceal your speech or publicize it; indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts}

data.name: s15
data.value: Alaa ya’lamu man khalaqa wa huwal lateeful khabeer {Does He who created not know, while He is the Subtle, the Acquainted?}

data.name: s16
data.value: Huwal lazee ja’ala lakumul arda zaloolan famshoo fee manaakibihaa wa kuloo mir rizqih; wa ilaihin nushoor {It is He who made the earth tame for you – so walk among its slopes and eat of His provision – and to Him is the resurrection}

data.name: s17
data.value: ‘A-amintum man fissamaaa’i aiyakhsifa bi kumul arda fa izaa hiya tamoor {Do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?}

data.name: s18
data.value: Am amintum man fissamaaa’i ai yursila ‘alaikum haasiban fasata’lamoona kaifa nazeer {Or do you feel secure that He who [holds authority] in the heaven would not send against you a storm of stones? Then you would know how [severe] was My warning}

data.name: s19
data.value: Wa laqad kazzabal lazeena min qablihim fakaifa kaana nakeer {And already had those before them denied, and how [terrible] was My reproach}

data.name: s2
data.value: Tabaarakal lazee biyadihil mulku wa huwa ‘alaa kulli shai-in qadeer {Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent –}

data.name: s20
data.value: Awalam yaraw ilat tairi fawqahum saaaffaatinw wa yaqbidn; maa yumsikuhunna il’lar rahmaan; innahoo bikulli shai in baseer {Do they not see the birds above them with wings outspread and [sometimes] folded in? None holds them [aloft] except the Most Merciful. Indeed He is, of all things, Seeing}

data.name: s21
data.value: Amman haazal lazee huwa jundul lakum yansurukum min doonir rahmaan; inilkaafiroona illaa fee ghuroor {Or who is it that could be an army for you to aid you other than the Most Merciful? The disbelievers are not but in delusion}

data.name: s22
data.value: Amman haazal lazee yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah; bal lajjoo fee ‘utuwwinw wa nufoor {Or who is it that could provide for you if He withheld His provision? But they have persisted in insolence and aversion}

data.name: s23
data.value: Afamai yamshee mukibban ‘alaa wajhihee ahdaaa ammany yamshee sawiyyan ‘alaa siratim mustaqeem {Then is one who walks fallen on his face better guided or one who walks erect on a straight path?}

data.name: s24
data.value: Qul huwal lazee ansha akum wa ja’ala lakumus sam’a wal absaara wal af’idata qaleelam maa tashkuroon {Say, “It is He who has produced you and made for you hearing and vision and hearts; little are you grateful.”}

data.name: s25
data.value: Qul huwal lazee zara akum fil ardi wa ilaihi tuhsharoon {Say, “It is He who has multiplied you throughout the earth, and to Him you will be gathered.”}

data.name: s26
data.value: Wa yaqooloona mataa haazal wa’du in kuntum saadiqeen {And they say, “When is this promise, if you should be truthful?”}

data.name: s27
data.value: Qul innamal ‘ilmu ‘indallaahi wa innamaaa ana nazeerum mubeen {Say, “The knowledge is only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner.”}

data.name: s28
data.value: Falaammaa ra-awhu zulfatan seee’at wujoohul lazeena kafaroo wa qeela haazal lazee kuntum bihee tadda’oon {But when they see it approaching, the faces of those who disbelieve will be distressed, and it will be said, “This is that for which you used to call.”}

data.name: s29
data.value: Qul ara’aytum in ahlaka niyal laahu wa mam ma’iya aw rahimanaa famai-yujeerul kaafireena min ‘azaabin aleem {Say, [O Muhammad], “Have you considered: whether Allah should cause my death and those with me or have mercy upon us, who can protect the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”}

data.name: s3
data.value: Allazee khalaqal mawta walhayaata liyabluwakum ayyukum ahsanu ‘amalaa; wa huwal ‘azeezul ghafoor {[He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed – and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving –}

data.name: s30
data.value: Qul huwar rahmaanu aamannaa bihee wa ‘alaihi tawakkalnaa fasata’lamoona man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen {Say, “He is the Most Merciful; we have believed in Him, and upon Him we have relied. And you will [come to] know who it is that is in clear error.”}

data.name: s31
data.value: Qul ara’aytum in asbaha maaa’ukum ghawran famai ya’teekum bimaaa’im ma’een {Say, “Have you considered: if your water was to become sunken [into the earth], then who could bring you flowing water?”}

data.name: s4
data.value: Allazee khalaqa sab’a samaawaatin tibaaqam maa taraa fee khalqir rahmaani min tafaawut farji’il basara hal taraa min futoor {[And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?}

data.name: s5
data.value: Summar ji’il basara karrataini yanqalib ilaikal basaru khaasi’anw wa huwa haseer {Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued}

data.name: s6
data.value: Wa laqad zaiyannas samaaa’ad dunyaa bimasaa beeha wa ja’alnaahaa rujoomal lish shayaateeni wa a’tadnaa lahum ‘azaabas sa’eer {And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze}

data.name: s7
data.value: Wa lillazeena kafaroo bi rabbihim ‘azaabu jahannama wa bi’sal maseer {And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination}

data.name: s8
data.value: Izaaa ulqoo feehaa sami’oo lahaa shaheeqanw wa hiya tafoor {When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up}

data.name: s9
data.value: Takaadu tamayyazu minal ghaizz kullamaaa ulqiya feehaa fawjun sa alahum khazanatuhaaa alam ya’tikum nazeer {It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, “Did there not come to you a warner?”}
